      • filterWords

        public java.lang.String[] filterWords(java.lang.String sendOrRec,
                             java.lang.String typeChoice)
        filter words for narrowing words down to some type, can be adj/adv/'*'...
        Parameters:
        sendOrRec: - if send, the words are based on the unprotected words. if receive, the words are based on GameWords file
        typeChoice:adj/adv/..... -
        Returns:
        filtered String array
